title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.35 - Terms and conditions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.35 - Terms and conditions

State Regulations
(a) Capitalization and recapitalizations of flexible financing programs for capital
access projects shall not exceed $300,000 and shall generally not be less than
$100,000, except in the case of revolving loan funds which may not be less than
$50,000. (b) Loans, grants and loan
guarantees for capital access projects shall generally not exceed
$100,000. (c) Capital access project
grants to not-for-profit child care centers shall generally not exceed 25
percent of the total project costs or $2,500 per new slot created, whichever is
less, but in no event shall the total grant exceed $100,000. (d) The foregoing terms and conditions are in
addition to the applicable general terms and conditions set forth in section
4243.4
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4243.35

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
